name: emelmujiro
description: Emelmujiro - AI Education and Consulting Company Official Website

scripts.dev:backend: cd backend && uv run python manage.py runserver
scripts.test: npm run test:frontend && npm run test:backend
scripts.test:backend: cd backend && uv run python manage.py test
scripts.clean: npm run clean:frontend && npm run clean:backend
scripts.clean:backend: find backend -type d -name '__pycache__' -exec rm -rf {} + && rm -rf backend/staticfiles
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd backend && uv sync
